newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Dead Russian lay in flat five years unnoticed.
newsitem.headline: Dead Russian lay in flat five years unnoticed.

text.p: A pensioner lay dead and unnoticed for five years in his flat in the Russian city of Perm, Itar-Tass news agency said on Saturday.
Workers who had come to repair water pipes found the corpse after breaking down the door of his apartment, it said.
The electricity had been turned off because of unpaid bills and the local social security department had simply struck the man off their books, Tass said.
A regional campaign launched last autumn to draw attention to the plight of lonely pensioners failed to locate the man.
It was no longer even possible to establish the cause of death, Tass said.
